name: Zendesk Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Zendesk Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Zendesk events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken

service.name: service
service.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service | 默认值: support | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - The fields to return the values of. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

conditions.name: conditions
conditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conditions | 作用: The condition to set | 默认值: {}
